title: Feature Engineering for Invariant Representations
description: Discuss feature extraction methods that are less sensitive to subject variability.

examples.description: Investigates inter-channel relationships for online prediction of microsleep states.
Employs sparse representation classification to address subject variability.

why_introduced: To extract features that are more robust to individual differences in EEG signals

all_upper_levels.title: Addressing Core Challenges with Machine Learning
all_upper_levels.section_id: 2. Addressing Core Challenges with Machine Learning

all_upper_levels.title: Tackling Subject Variability
all_upper_levels.description: Methods to address subject variability in EEG based driving fatigue detection.
